name: St. Joseph Medical Center
description: A large regional hospital complex in North Bellingham. Eerily silent, signs of chaos and desertion are everywhere. This is where you woke up from a coma.
exterior_description: A multi-story modern hospital building dominates the view, connected to older wings. Emergency bay doors hang open, windows are dark or broken. Abandoned cars litter the parking lot.
history: A major medical center serving the Whatcom County region before the outbreak devastated the area.

floors.description: A standard patient care floor. Flickering emergency lights cast long shadows down the main corridor.

rooms.name: Patient Room 305
rooms.description: Your starting point. A standard hospital room with a bed, bedside table, and an empty IV stand. The window looks out onto the chaotic parking lot below.

points_of_interest.description: Rumpled sheets and a discarded basic hospital gown on the floor.
points_of_interest.hinting_at: Your recent presence, potential basic clothing

points_of_interest.description: A small, locked drawer in the bedside table.
points_of_interest.hinting_at: Requires tools to open, potential minor personal effects or supplies

rooms.name: Nurses' Station - Floor 3
rooms.description: The central hub for the floor staff. Computers are dark, papers scattered, phones off the hook. An overturned coffee mug stains patient charts.

points_of_interest.hinting_at: Potential information (lore), maybe notes about the outbreak's early stages

points_of_interest.description: A first-aid kit mounted on the wall, partially open.

valuables.name: Painkillers (generic)
valuables.description: A small bottle of over-the-counter pain relief tablets.

rooms.name: Linen Closet - Floor 3
rooms.description: A small room stacked with shelves of clean and soiled linens, blankets, and gowns.

points_of_interest.description: A pile of clean towels and sheets.
points_of_interest.hinting_at: Can be used as makeshift bandages or warmth

rooms.name: Main Corridor - Floor 3
rooms.description: The main hallway connecting the rooms on this floor. Doors lead to patient rooms, utility closets, and the elevator bay/stairs.

points_of_interest.description: Gurneys left haphazardly, some with dried bloodstains.
points_of_interest.hinting_at: Signs of recent panic and struggle

rooms.name: Elevator Bay - Floor 3
rooms.description: A bank of elevators. Call buttons are dark and unresponsive. One door is jammed half-open, revealing a dark shaft.

points_of_interest.description: Pry marks on the jammed elevator door control panel.
points_of_interest.hinting_at: Attempted entry, potential hazard or path

rooms.name: Stairwell Access - Floor 3
rooms.description: A heavy fire door leading to a concrete stairwell marked 'Staff Only'. Echoes travel easily.

points_of_interest.description: Sounds (or silence) from above or below.
points_of_interest.hinting_at: Potential danger or clear path on other floors

floors.description: The main public-access level of the hospital. Signs of chaos are more pronounced here.

rooms.name: Main Lobby
rooms.description: Once the main entrance and waiting area. Furniture is overturned, luggage scattered, dried bloodstains on the tile floor. The main glass doors are shattered.

points_of_interest.description: A long, deserted reception desk with smashed computer monitors.
points_of_interest.hinting_at: Potential keys, security logs, minor office supplies

points_of_interest.description: Access ways to other parts of the ground floor are visible.

rooms.name: Elevator Bay - Ground Floor
rooms.description: Elevator access on the ground floor. Same state as Floor 3 - unresponsive, one jammed door.

rooms.name: Stairwell Access - Ground Floor
rooms.description: Access to the main stairwell from the ground floor.

points_of_interest.description: The door to Floor 2 seems barricaded from the other side.
points_of_interest.hinting_at: Blocked path, potential survivors or danger

rooms.name: Gift Shop
rooms.description: Small shop near the lobby. Shelves are mostly ransacked, goods strewn about.

points_of_interest.description: Overturned display of candy and snacks.
A rack of unsold local newspapers, dated from just before the collapse.

rooms.name: Emergency Wing Corridor
rooms.description: Wide corridor leading towards the Emergency Department. More gurneys and medical debris here. Double doors at the end are marked 'Emergency - Restricted Access'.

points_of_interest.description: An abandoned ambulance visible through damaged bay doors at a side entrance.

rooms.name: Cafeteria Entrance
rooms.description: Entrance to the hospital cafeteria dining area.

rooms.name: Cafeteria Dining Area
rooms.description: Large room with rows of tables and chairs, many overturned. Trays with decaying food sit abandoned.

points_of_interest.description: Vending machines along one wall. Some are smashed, others seem intact but dark.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Industrial kitchen with stainless steel counters, ovens, and other equipment. A strong smell of decay hangs in the air.

points_of_interest.description: A walk-in freezer with a heavy, closed door. Power is off.
points_of_interest.hinting_at: Spoiled food, potential preserved supplies, danger, requires forcing open

points_of_interest.description: Dry pantry shelves, mostly empty but a few canned goods remain.
A magnetic strip on the wall holds several large chef's knives.

valuables.name: Chef's Knife
valuables.description: A large, sturdy kitchen knife. Could serve as a basic weapon.

rooms.name: Pharmacy Entrance
rooms.description: A counter area for prescription pickup, protected by a heavy metal grate that has been pulled down and locked. A separate, sturdy door marked 'Pharmacy - Staff Only' is nearby.

points_of_interest.description: The locked staff door to the main pharmacy storage.
points_of_interest.hinting_at: Valuable medical supplies, requires lockpicking or heavy breaching
